snippet: The branches of service are preparing to integrate women into physically hazardous combat positions like the Navy SEALs and the Army Rangers, senior defense officials said.
abstract: Senior defense officials say branches of service are preparing to integrate women into physically hazardous combat positions like Navy SEALs and Army Rangers.
lead_paragraph: The branches of service are preparing to integrate women into physically hazardous combat positions like the Navy SEALs and the Army Rangers, senior defense officials said.

headline.main: Elite Units in U.S. Military to Admit Women
headline.print_headline: Elite Units In Military To Admit Women

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
